name: Exile-Land
description: The Exile-land is a top-down ARPG game. Similar to the normal ARPG, players can control the character to hit the enemies by using lightsabre (Melee) and micro-gladius (Ranged Attack). In addition, the players also can spell the special abilities like dash and time control during the fight. These weapons and abilities can be upgraded in Elecbay with more damage and more power by consuming the energy obtained in Mindset Correction Controller. In the story mode, the player will be struggle in the ethical dilemma, while the different decisions made by players will lead to a multiple ending. This game aims at establishing an immersive adventure experience for the players and also provide space for conducting different strategies in the various period of the game. Ethical choice is an interesting point that makes the player to think about what they should do better and whether they can afford to the result.
